sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗的回答故意模棱两可。

sentences.en: He had deliberately misdirected the reporters.
sentences.cn: 他故意给记者们指错方向。

sentences.en: He shook his head slowly and deliberately.
sentences.cn: 他缓缓而慎重地摇摇头。

sentences.en: I firmly believe our strategy is being deliberately, cynically manipulated.
sentences.cn: 我坚信我们的策略正在被人存心恶意操纵。

sentences.en: It looks as if the blaze was started deliberately.
sentences.cn: 看起来似乎是有人蓄意纵火。
克里斯托弗先生故意回答得含糊其词。

sentences.en: My ex-wife deliberately sabotages my access to the children.
sentences.cn: 我的前妻蓄意阻挠我见孩子。

sentences.en: She has been deliberately left off the guest list.
sentences.cn: 她被故意排除在嘉宾名单之外。

sentences.en: She was deliberately mismatching articles of clothing.
She was, quite deliberately, making him feel unwelcome.
sentences.cn: 她是有意让他觉得自己不受欢迎。

sentences.en: She's been deliberately ignoring him all day.
The police deliberately kept a low profile in most places.
sentences.cn: 警方在大多数地方有意保持低调。

sentences.en: The programme was deliberately slanted to make the home team look good.
sentences.cn: 这个节目故意偏向主场队，以使他们看上去表现还不错。

sentences.en: They have been accused of deliberately causing interference to transmissions.
sentences.cn: 他们被指故意干扰信号传输。

sentences.en: With almost evangelical fervour, Marks warns against deliberately seeking a tan.
sentences.cn: 几乎是凭着一股疯狂的热情，马克斯警告人们不要刻意追求晒成一身古铜色。

words.tran_cn: 故意的；深思熟虑的；从容的

trans.tran_cn: 有意地，从容地，不慌不忙地
trans.tran_en: done in a way that is intended or planned
